headline: Wall Street Analysts Think AppLovin (APP) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), AppLovin (APP) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
